job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to modifying and enhancing the performance of an AI system, which falls under the scope of model improvement and fine-tuning.

job_tasks.phrase: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
job_tasks.justification: Providing feedback on AI outputs and participating in fine-tuning sessions are core activities involved in the modeling process, specifically for improving generative AI models.

job_tasks.phrase: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
job_tasks.justification: Prototyping and testing new AI tools and methodologies directly involve experimenting with and evaluating models and techniques, which is a key aspect of the modeling task.

job_tasks.phrase: Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support
job_tasks.justification: Integrating AI capabilities with existing systems or processes to deliver a functional outcome (customer support) involves software development tasks, such as building interfaces or workflows.

soft_skills.phrase: analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short
ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role
Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support

classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes improving AI systems, fine-tuning models, and integrating AI capabilities into customer support. While it involves some elements of traditional software development, the core focus is on enhancing and leveraging generative AI for specific outcomes, aligning with the definition of a GenAI Engineer.
